item.title: My Perfect 24 Hours, If I Were a Teleporting Billionaire | Travel Away
item.description:
My Perfect 24 Hours, If I Were a Teleporting Billionaire | Travel Away

Bear with me on this one. Let's say it's summer, end of August to be more precise. I live in Romania, I am a billionaire, and, of course, teleportation is possible. To make it easier for you to calculate (if you want to), use the Eastern European time (UTC+2).

item.title: Instagram for Business
item.description:
Instagram for Business

Social media is an incredibly powerful tool - and Instagram is one of the most powerful, so why not use it to its full advantage? With well over 400 million users worldwide, there is an incredibly large audience just waiting to discover your brand.

item.title: Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America
item.description:
Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America

Tiny homes are all the rage, so it makes perfect sense that tiny homes people list on Airbnb are also quite popular. And that's…

item.title: Projections in the Forest
item.description:
Projections in the Forest

Behind the scenes: http://vimeo.com/3hund/behindthescenes The projection mapping "bioluminescent forest" is made by artists Friedrich van Schoor and Tarek Mawad. The artists spent six weeks in the forest fascinated by the silence and natural occurrences in nature, especially the phenomenon "bioluminescence".

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.
